gensokyo Package¶

gensokyo Package¶

collision Module¶

class gensokyo.collision.CollisionManager¶

Bases: builtins.object

Collision Manager

On every tick/update, checks all added collision components for collisions. Uses weak references so components garbage collect normally. Each component is associated with a dictionary of collision handlers. The key is the class whose collision against triggers the handler.

{
    class: {
        component: {
            type: method,
            ...
        },
        ...
    }
}

self.components[class][component][other_class] = method
component.method(other)
add(component)¶

Adds handlers of component.

First checks for instance attribute chandlers and adds handlers if has. Else checks for class attribute chandlers.

add_handlers(component, handlers)¶

handlers = {class: method,...}

update(dt)¶

object Module¶

class gensokyo.object.AIComponent¶

Bases: gensokyo.object.AbstractComponent, pyglet.event.EventDispatcher

Abstract AI Component

There’s not much to put here... Most likely you’ll have this handle and dispatch events. You’ll have to implement that yourself.

class gensokyo.object.AbstractComponent¶

Bases: builtins.object

class gensokyo.object.AbstractContainer¶

Bases: pyglet.event.EventDispatcher

Abstract Container for Components

Keeps a reference to components to keep alive. Propagates updates to components with update method.
